titleStmt.title: Deaths advantage: or A sermon preached at the funerall of that noble and valiant gentleman, Colonell William Gould, high sheriff of Devon: by order of Parliament, and late commander of the fort and island in Plymouth. By Stephen Midhope, Mr. of Arts.
titleStmt.author: Midhope, Stephen.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. N. for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold at the Marigold in Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
